channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Planning Analytics Local
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Planning Analytics Local

item.title: CVE-2023-28520|2023-05-12T01:11:55.961Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 250454.

item.title: CVE-2024-31907|2024-05-31T13:09:56.762Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 289889.
